resources.string: An error occurred - please try again

First, check your internet connection.\n\nSpotify\'s Google Express Sign-In feature is currently unavailable. If you created your Spotify account with your Google Account, you can sign in as usual by entering your Google email address and password.
Why we ask you to log in

We use Spotify to access songs and playlists. We need you to be authenticated in order to play music for you. You enter your credentials on Spotify\'s own interface - we only access user information to which you have previously consented.
